duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with diverse teams to provide cutting-edge technology solutions within a project-based framework.
Develop and test software applications using Java, Python, C++, and other relevant programming languages.
Implement software development principles, algorithms, and data structures to deliver high-quality software.
Contribute to software testing, debugging, and maintenance processes.
Participate in agile development methodologies and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Stay updated on web development frameworks and technologies to optimize software solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
